## Public Member Functions

### eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr() {#ab544417d50db46882a3a223233830dbc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator WebAssemblyFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is called during prolog/epilog code insertion to eliminate call frame setup and destroy pseudo instructions (but only if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> is using them).

It is responsible for eliminating these instructions, replacing them with concrete instructions. This method need only be implemented if using call frame setup/destroy pseudo instructions. Returns an iterator pointing to the instruction after the replaced one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp/#l00244">244</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasReservedCallFrame() {#a6ac032ff4fb3914f8f6f29bc9b8f2cb0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool WebAssemblyFrameLowering::hasReservedCallFrame (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Under normal circumstances, when a frame pointer is not required, we reserve argument space for call sites in the function immediately on entry to the current function.

This eliminates the need for add/sub sp brackets around call sites. Returns true if the call frame is included as part of the stack frame.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp/#l00121">121</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### hasBP() {#aabc99755558303881aa58229f6335c89}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool WebAssemblyFrameLowering::hasBP (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}>
We need a base pointer in the case of having items on the stack that require stricter alignment than the stack pointer itself.

Because we need to shift the stack pointer by some unknown amount to force the alignment, we need to record the value of the stack pointer on entry to the function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp/#l00091">91</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### needsSP() {#a80308da692e32540c4dffe9561b16938}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool WebAssemblyFrameLowering::needsSP (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}>
Returns true if this function needs a local user-space stack pointer.

Unlike a machine stack pointer, the wasm user stack pointer is a global variable, so it is loaded into a register in the prolog.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp/#l00155">155</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### needsSPForLocalFrame() {#add9bf59914f9afd679766c8cfdcb0237}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool WebAssemblyFrameLowering::needsSPForLocalFrame (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h/#l00075">75</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp/#l00128">128</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.cpp</a>.

### needsSPWriteback() {#ac8f6a5a50159b5a2b2251c37c459440f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool WebAssemblyFrameLowering::needsSPWriteback (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF) const</>}>
Returns true if the local user-space stack pointer needs to be written back to &#95;&#95;stack&#95;pointer global by this function (this is not meaningful if needsSP is false).

If false, the stack red zone can be used and only a local SP is needed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-h">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp/#l00163">163</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyframelowering-cpp">WebAssemblyFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### RedZoneSize {#ae70515c96b13eefdcecc4597611cbe54}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const size&#95;t llvm::WebAssemblyFrameLowering::RedZoneSize = 128</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Size of the red zone for the user stack (leaf functions can use this much space below the stack pointer without writing it back to &#95;&#95;stack&#95;pointer global).
